text: Chúfēi tāmen jiārùle yǔ nǐmen yǒu héyuē de mínzhòng, huò lái guīshùn nǐmen, tāmen de xīnzhōng jì bù yuàn tóng nǐmen zuòzhàn, yě bù yuàn tóng tāmen de mínzhòng zuòzhàn. Jiǎrú ān lā yìyù, tā bì shǐ tāmen yādǎo nǐmen, ér tāmen bìdìng gōngjí nǐmen. Jiǎrú tāmen chèlí nǐmen, bù jìngōng nǐmen bìng xiàng nǐmen tíchū hépíng, nàme, ān lā bùxǔ nǐmen [zài] jìngōng tāmen.
